name: Super Hectic Intensive Tournament
description:
S.H.I.T. is the world's most exciting event of the year. Top athletes from around the world come to compete in the epic annual blood-bath. In the end only one emerges a winner. This year team Red and team Blue have advanced to the final round. Televised all over the globe, you watch as the ultimate battle takes place to crown the winner of this year's S.H.I.T.

The rules are simple; a rifle kill grants one point, while a revolver kill grants two. The first contestant to reach 30 points is the winner of the Super Hectic Intensive Tournament.

  • Local 2 Player Multiplayer
  • Full Controller Support
  • Mobile Controller Support via SRSController
